name: The Artifact (itch) (juanyfanga)
description:
This is my second game made for "The Most Comprehensive Guide To Unity Game Development" which is a Udemy Course.

WASD: To move.

LeftMouse: To attack.

You have to protect The Artifact for 300 seconds. 

Grey Wolves: Attack the artifact.

Red Wolves: Attack the bushes.

Bushes: Give you fruits to heal the artifact.

Have fun and protect the artifact!
